Author: UsagiHotline
Text: The answer honestly varies from person to person, but in my experience I've found that partners that that's a problem for...make it very apparent.  However, my husband tells me all the time that he loves my thighs, tummy, butt, all my jiggly parts, and I don't have reason to doubt him beyond my own disordered thoughts about myself. I'm probably the "skinniest" girl he's dated, tbh. He's loved me through weight loss, weight gain, pregnancy, all of my ED spirals, and I think that if someone truly loves you, it's obviously not something they say just to "be nice".
